DeviceID.title: Device ID
DeviceID.description:
The device ID of the AirPlay destination in the format 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx'. This field isn't case-sensitive.
The list of visible AirPlay destinations will be limited to devices that are present in the `AllowList` field of all installed AirPlay payloads.
Specifying the same MACAddress more than once, whether in the same payload across different payloads, will result in undefined behavior.
As of iOS 18 and macOS 15, `DeviceID` isn't supported, as tvOS 18 AirPlay destinations do not support it.

DeviceName.title: Device Name
DeviceName.description:
The name of the AirPlay device.
The list of visible AirPlay destinations will be limited to devices that are present in the AllowList field of all installed AirPlay payloads.

AllowList.title: Allow List
AllowList.description: If present, only AirPlay destinations in this list are available to the device. This allow list applies to supervised devices.

DeviceID.title: Device ID
DeviceID.description:
The device ID of the AirPlay destination in the format 'xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx'. This field isn't case-sensitive.
The list of visible AirPlay destinations will be limited to devices that are present in the `AllowList` field of all installed AirPlay payloads.
Specifying the same MACAddress more than once, whether in the same payload across different payloads, will result in undefined behavior.
As of iOS 18 and macOS 15, `DeviceID` isn't supported, as tvOS 18 AirPlay destinations do not support it.

DeviceName.title: Device Name
DeviceName.description:
The name of the AirPlay device.
The list of visible AirPlay destinations will be limited to devices that are present in the AllowList field of all installed AirPlay payloads.

Whitelist.title: Allow List (legacy)
Whitelist.description: Use 'AllowList' instead. This key is deprecated in iOS 14.5 and macOS 11.3.

DeviceName.title: Device Name
DeviceName.description: The name of the AirPlay destination; used in iOS, and available in macOS 15 and later.

DeviceID.title: Device ID
DeviceID.description:
The device ID of the AirPlay destination; used in macOS.
In macOS 15 and later, 'DeviceID' is deprecated as tvOS 18 AirPlay destinations do not support it; use 'DeviceName' instead.

Password.title: Password
Password.description: The password for the AirPlay destination.

Passwords.title: Passwords
Passwords.description: If present, sets passwords for known AirPlay destinations. Using multiple entries for the same destination, whether within the same payload or across multiple installed payloads, is an error and results in undefined behavior.
